component.name: Ultimaker Cura
component.summary: Slicer to prepare your 3D printing projects

description.p: Ultimaker Cura is a slicer, an application that prepares your model for 3D printing. Optimized, expert-tested profiles for 3D printers and materials mean you can start printing reliably in no time. And with industry-standard software integration, you can streamline your workflow for maximum efficiency.
